name: stardust (itch) (Warkus)
description:
Stardust

It should have been a routine mission. One of those that you have already done so many times. But now 26 days have passed since "the incident".

This is a solo developer project. The game was made with the Godot engine for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" Game Jam. The game and its assets were created during the jam with the following exceptions:

Font: Xolonium (https://fontlibrary.org/de/font/xolonium) OFL (SIL Open Font License)

Audio: https://freesound.org/ All CC0
